transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan namaskar sir.
Executive: Namaskar sir kaise hain aap?
Customer: Main badhiya main badhiya aur aap kaise batao kal Naveen ji ka call aaya tha raat mein.
Executive: Haan sir wo calls jo hai bahut kam ho gayi aur leads bhi kam ho gayi achanak.
Customer: Aap se to meri baat hui thi recent us time pe matlab kal parso hi aap se hui thi na sir.
Customer: Haan ji teen din pehle hui thi.
Executive: Haan teen din pehle hi baat hui thi aap bolte the ki sabhi cheeze to theek chal rahi kuch tiger pe bhi kaam kiya tha humne.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Wo bol rahe the kuch nahi aa raha hai tum dekho aaj kal din ka call aa gaya tha mere paas aaya tha saman.
Customer: To unhi ko main call subah se kar raha tha main ki baat kar leta hu unse.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Batao kya problem aa rahi hai?
Executive: Leads bahut kam ho rahi hai achanak.
Customer: Leads portal pe nahi aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan portal pe leads nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Abhi jo aa rakhi hai tiger king cream ki Falcon labs tiger capsule pe aa rakhi hai 13 minute pehle ek ghanta pehle char ghanta pehle ye sab leads kaam ki nahi hai.
Customer: Main ek baar unse baat kar leta hu kis hisab se wo lead ke liye baat kar rahe hain aap isliye aapke is number pe call back kar raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Lead manager se jo hai
Customer: Call nahi aa rahi hai aaj kal.
Customer: Calls kam aa rahi hai ye bata rahe hain aap.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Nahi calls to aati hai buyer consumption pattern pe buyer kitna pe catalog view dekh rahe hain us hisab se calls aati hai. Jitna buyer lead consume karoge back to back us hisab se calls aapke paas jayenge. Calls abhi ye jo November mein 131 calls hain 250 calls hain. Relevant calls to aa rahi hai jo calls aa rahi hai aapke 76% calls aap answer kar rahe ho. Aapko October mein 250 calls aayi hai September mein 204 aayi hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To nahi calls bhi aa rahi hai achi khasi itni calls to aa rahi hai inquiry ka agar baat kar le to 1068 inquiry October mein hai 495 inquiry November mein hai 1063 inquiry September mein hai.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Matlab kahan pe kami hai wo thoda calls bhi hai inquiry bhi bhar kar hai.
Executive: Theek hai main abhi ek baar confirmation le leta hu phir aapko phone karta hu. Ek baar Naveen ji se meri baat kara do agar possible ho to matlab main baat kar leta hu unse agar hai wahan pe to.
Executive: Ek minute rukhiye main baat karata hu.
Executive: Haan main aapki baat karata hu ek minute line pe rahiye. Haan haan.
Executive: Ji haan hello.
Customer: Batana batana tere ko kya kahan kami hai.
Executive: Hello Naveen ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir namaskar.
Executive: Namaskar namaskar.
Executive: Neha baat kar rahi hu sir main.
Customer: Kya naam bataya aapne?
Executive: Neha sir.
Customer: Neha Neha haan bataye mam kya problem aa rahi hai calls mein to dekh raha hu calls to aa rahi hai.
Executive: Calls to aa rahi hai lekin aisa hota hai yesterday ke baad se hum jab hum morning mein show karte dekhte hain isko theek hai panel ko to matra panch se chhe lead milti hai hume.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan to jis time pe aap portal open karte the abhi main khol raha tha main ek ghante pehle bhi by lead hai 13 minute pehle ke by lead agar us time pe by lead kam dikhti hai na.
Executive: By lead is pe baat nahi ho rahi sir lead manager pe baat kar rahi hu main jo lead manager pe.
Customer: Lead map inquiries ki baat kar rahe ho na aap.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: To inquiry jo aa rahi hai us time pe us time same pe nahi aaye honge phir baad mein usme inquiry aati hai. Jo by lead consume karoge mere paas to data inquiry to pure month by month mere paas data hai jo aapke paas aa rahi hai.
Executive: Wo aapke paas dikha raha hai wo maan rahi hu main aapki lekin hamare paas bhi to show honi chahiye sir leads jis pe hum call kar sake agar char se panch call milenge to kya karenge call bataye char se panch call thodi hoti hai.
Executive: Calls aap by lead consume karoge tab usi tarah call karte ho aap by lead consumption mein jo by leads mein aati hai. Aapki jo by leads aati thi tiger king cream chahe us pe call karo usi tarah baat kar sakte ho top contacted buyer pe click karke.
Executive: By leads to hume kharidni hoti hai kuch leads hume automatic milti hai na jo aati hai panel pe.
Executive: Automatic lead milti hai lead kahan milti hai by lead mein jo aati hai wahi lead to milti hai aapko. Aur kahan se aapko lead milti hai ek inquiry jo aapke paas aati hai calls aati hai lead to wahi hai jo aapko by lead wale section pe milti hai.
Executive: Aapke by lead balance ko jo check karenge jo is package mein aapko by lead jo mil rahi hai wahi aapko milti hai 30 weekly aur do daily ki wo to aapko mil rahi hai na.
Executive: Wo to hume milti hai sir do lead theek hai.
Executive: 30 weekly ki aur do daily ki yahi milti hai.
Executive: Lekin haan query jo hai wo bahut kam ho gayi hai sir char panch din se bahut kam hai sir kehne ka matlab ye hai hamara.
Executive: Dekhiye direct queries ka jo baat kar rahe hain na wo by lead consumption pattern pe depend karta hai aap jitna by lead consume karoge na usi hisab se aapki inquiry ya calls ka ratio bhi badhta hai. Kyunki by lead bhi aap kam consume kar rahe the by lead jo hai abhi bhi 23 by lead aapki bachi hai jis hisab se by lead consume karoge by lead consumption pattern rakhoge us hisab se calls aati hai mam.
Executive: Acha.
Executive: Aaj inquiry to aapke paas achi inquiry aa rahi hai to inquiry nahi aati hai hamare inquiry aap bolte hain main screenshot bhej du aapko WhatsApp pe October mein 1068 inquiries aayi hai September mein 1063 August mein 1177.
Executive: Customer aise bhi hote hain sir ek hi customer char char panch panch baar search karte hain wo.
Executive: To kya inquiry to hum nahi kar rahe na aapka panel koi bhi dekhega usme inquiry generate hui call aapko koi bhi kar sakta hai ki hume ye requirement hai. To wo to buyers hai na mujhe bhi agar requirement main bhi to puchne ke liye bhi to call kar sakta hu kya rate chal raha hai kaise kya de rahe ho aap. Inquiry us hisab se bhi to generate hoti hai na. Agar mujhe chahiye ortho nil powder to main aapko call lagaunga to wo inquiry ban jayegi calls aapke paas aayenge to jaruri hai ki wo convert ho. But inquiry ya calls ka flow aapke portal pe bahut acha hai aap chaho to.
Executive: Itna acha nahi hai sir char panch din se kam ho gaya hai phir bhi.
Executive: Char panch din se to calls by lead to consume karo by lead ka bata rahe hain by lead nahi aa rahi hai pata nahi.
Executive: Nahi hai sir by leads to consume karte hain.
Executive: Haan to by lead aap aaj consume kiye hain aapne by lead?
Executive: Ji.
Executive: To by lead daily basis pe consume karo koi bhi dikkat aayegi nahi isme jahan tak main aapko bata du. Baki by lead to relevant hai na by lead mein to koi issue nahi hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi usme to jyada kuch issue hai nahi. Sir to wo upar niche inquiry aa rahi hai aapke portal pe ho sakta hai do teen din mein kam aayi hongi par theek hai upar niche wo to badhte rehti hai wo.
Executive: Aur batao isme aur koi isme issue aa rahi hai to wo. To aap hamesha video mein connect kar lo main dikha deta hu ek baar Naveen ji se meri baat karao ek baar.
Executive: Abhi sir meeting mein hai Naveen sir.
Executive: Naveen sir meeting mein hai?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Abhi aur to mere side se koi concern to aisa nahi hai kyunki unhone kal customer care pe phone kiya tha na to mere paas ek feedback open hai to usko main close kar du abhi?
Executive: Haan sir.
Executive: Ek aapke paas ek feedback mail aayega aapke paas please aap yes karke aap de dena theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai baki mera personal number hai main aapko number sir ke paas hai mera personal number aap note kar lo aap directly call kar lo kahin bhi dikkat aati hai to.
Executive: Theek hai aap note down kar lo mera personal number likh lo aap main bhejta hu aapko.
Executive: 810 likh lena aap mera number.
Customer: Ek second.
Customer: 810
Executive: 25
Customer: 25
Executive: 11
Customer: 11
Executive: 817
Customer: 817 okay.
Executive: Rahul naam hai direct call kar lo kahin bhi dikkat aati hai aap sir ke paas number hai hi mera ek baar Naveen ji ko bhi number mera de dena kya hota hai mujhe direct call kar le.
Executive: Okay okay sir.
Executive: To ye concern hai main close kar raha hu aapka ek feedback jayega phir aap usme yes kar dena mail pe.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Decrease in calls and leads.

- Leads not reflecting on the portal.

- Reduced number of inquiries in the morning.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed inquiries are being generated.

- Executive shared data on inquiries and calls.

- Executive shared personal number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to receive a feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, portal, calls, consumption
